message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, but I'm open to discussing further if you have any thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective. While I value your interest, the product's worth to me is significantly higher. How about we meet at $15,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's my final offer. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
